title.narrative: Creating an Enabling Post-conflict Environment forPopulations in Kayin State, and Facilitating the SafeReturn of IDPs and Refugees

description.narrative: The specific objective of this project is to provide comprehensive development assistance throughcommunity-led structures and to ensure an environment conducive to the return of IDPs and refugeesin 80 villages in Kayin State. The project design recognises that socio-economic conditions withincommunities need to be improved in order to create an environment that can encourage and sustainthe resettlement of IDPs and refugees. Without such improvements, their return is likely to creategre

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Burma/Myanmar

description.narrative: Country: Myanmar, with special focus on: Kayin State including Thandaunggyi, Hpapun and Kawkreik townships.

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
